mapper.update:
UPDATE customer_user SET
name = #{name} ,
wx_name = #{wxName} ,
wx_open_id = #{wxOpenId} ,
sex = #{sex} ,
phone_number = #{phoneNumber} ,
address = #{address} ,
longitude = #{longitude} ,
latitude = #{latitude} ,
channel = #{channel} ,
remark = #{remark} ,
create_time = #{createTime} ,
update_time = #{updateTime}
WHERE id = #{id}
